font.div: - It has title Hacking
- It has aspect ratio 6:5
- It has a black background

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 250px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.div: - It uses small font size
- It is green on black
- It consists of 13 content lines followed by a blank line
- Each content line contains one password
- It is directly below the header
- It has 0.3 second pause after displaying each line

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 359px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.div: - It indicates the player should enter a password
- It is directly below the password list
- It uses small font size
- It is green on black

switch.text: - It indicates the player should enter a password...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 487px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.div: - It uses small font size
- It is green on black
- It has 0.3 second pause after displaying each line
- It contains four content lines separated by three blank lines
- The first content line is the guess
- The second and third content lines indicate failure
- The fourth content line is a prompt to press enter for exit
- It is in the center of the window

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 113px; margin-left: 31px;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.div: - It has 0.3 second pause after displaying each line
- It consists of two content lines followed by a blank line
- The first content line indicates debug mode
- The second content line indicates 1 attempt left
- It is the top left corner of the window
- It uses small font size
- It is green on black

switch.text: - It has 0.3 second pause after displaying each line...
